title: Ethiopia enforces nationwide ban on single-use plastic bags
desc: Single-use plastic bags have been prohibited in Ethiopia since 31 January this year. Their production, import, storage, sale and use are now banned, TV BRICS reports, citing Fana Media Corporation.

title: International condemnation of new Israeli settlement measures in West Bank grows
desc: The United Nations says it is "gravely concerned" over Israeli plans to expand control over the occupied West Bank.

title: Infrastructure downsizes Canberra offices with new move
desc: Infrastructure Department to downsize Canberra offices, moving 843 staff to 7 London Circuit as remote work trends continue.

title: How to stay regular and beat constipation, according to an expert
desc: From keeping your stress levels under control to a furry bedtime snack, this is what really gets things moving.

title: Serco accused of ‘petty and vindictive’ removal of artwork from court cells
desc: Government contractor stripped custody suites in England and Wales of motivational murals, report says

title: Why Sexual Health Education Still Matters for Gen Z
desc: Sexual health education is still often considered a taboo topic, especially among Gen Z.

desc: Leaders gather this week for the Munich Security Conference, with European security at a crossroads.

title: Qld expands free flu vax program for 2026
desc: The Pharmacy Guild of Australia Queensland (PGAQ) has welcomed the Crisafulli Government’s announcement of an enhanced free flu vaccination program for 2026, describing it as a significant step in improving access and easing pressure on the state’s health system. Free flu vax program further strengthens role of community pharmacy in preventative health Announced by Minister […]

title: Astro One Sports And Epic Packs Offered At Discounted Prices Until 30 April 2026
desc: Astro has announced promotional discounts for its flagship Astro One packages, which have been discounted up to RM40 per month.
